document_data.name: ''Ring of Frost''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ring of frost''''' was a [[magical item|magical]] [[ring]] capable of producing frost.
document_data.Powers: A ''ring of frost'' functioned like a ''[[wand]] of [[frost]]'', though it had an unlimited number of charges.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1369 DR]], [[Ascalan]], a retired [[wizard]] and [[fishmonger]] of [[The Fish House]] in [[Wheloon]], [[Cormyr]], owned a ''ring of frost''. He used it to refrigerate fish and create blocks of ice for sale.
